Description: Lower part of a limestone stela of Apa Joseph Pegosh(and others); twenty-four(surviving) lines of Coptic text; border of lozenges.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.143-144)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Associated names: Named in inscription: Apa Joseph Pegosh
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I App:16 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
